name: vito
description: Vito is a self-hosted deployment and release dashboard for web services. It organizes environments, releases, and health checks into a unified web interface for teams.
features: Deployment tracking: Track deployments across multiple environments and services.
Release management: Manage releases with version tracking and deployment history.
Environment organization: Organize services by environment like staging, production, and development.
Health monitoring: Monitor service health and availability with status checks.
Deployment history: View complete deployment history with timestamps and changelogs.
Team dashboard: Provide a unified view of all deployments for team visibility.
Release notes: Document releases with notes and change descriptions for team communication.
Status indicators: See deployment status at a glance with visual health indicators.
Multi-service: Manage multiple services and applications from one dashboard.
Rollback tracking: Track rollbacks and deployment failures for incident analysis.
Web interface: Access deployment information through a modern web interface.
API integration: Integrate with CI/CD pipelines using the REST API.
